title: Can anyone assist me?
body: During a few game's I have been lagging and I honestly don't know why. My ms is at 28-30 and my fps is always 60 and the game just randomly stops working. Minion's arent losing health and Champion are teleporting all over the map.Can someone give me some idea's as to what is happening? Thank you

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some packet loss, which will result in input delays.  Try running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get see what results come up with your network.  Let me know what you find!
